config.siddhiApp: @App:name('IsAnalytics-ExecutionPlan-SessionData') @App:description('Description of the session execution plan') define stream SessionStatPerMinute (meta_tenantId int, bucketId long, bucketStart long, bucketEnd long, year int, month int, day int, hour int, minute int, activeSessionCount long, newSessionCount long, terminatedSessionCount long); @Store(type="rdbms",datasource="Session1DB") define aggregation sessionAggregation from SessionStatPerMinute select meta_tenantId, bucketId, bucketStart, bucketEnd, activeSessionCount, newSessionCount, terminatedSessionCount group by meta_tenantId aggregate every sec...year;

queryData.query: from sessionAggregation within {{from}}L, {{to}}L per "{{per}}s" select AGG_TIMESTAMP, activeSessionCount
from sessionAggregation within {{from}}L, {{to}}L per "{{per}}s" select AGG_TIMESTAMP, activeSessionCount, newSessionCount, terminatedSessionCount
